When creating a new URL Test, the recorder does not appear to stop or start 
correctly.  The following error message was visible in the consolelog:

*****************************Exception Stack********************************
error processing command StartRecording
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.recorder.remote.RecorderAgentCo
ntroller.startRecording(RecorderAgentController.java:374)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.recorder.remote.RecorderCommand
Handler.handleStartRecordingCommand(RecorderCommandHandler.java:118)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.recorder.remote.RecorderCommand
Handler.handleCommand(RecorderCommandHandler.java:53)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.remote.RemoteComponentSkeleton.
incomingCommand(RemoteComponentSkeleton.java)


****************************************************************************

When the browser was closed, the following message appeared in the console log:

*****************************Exception Stack********************************
error processing command Stop
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.recorder.remote.RecorderAgentCo
ntroller.stopRecording(RecorderAgentController.java:390)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.recorder.remote.RecorderCommand
Handler.handleStopCommand(RecorderCommandHandler.java:91)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.recorder.remote.RecorderCommand
Handler.handleCommand(RecorderCommandHandler.java:74)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.remote.RemoteComponentSkeleton.

Incorrect name for RECORDER_ERROR_STARTING message in the plugin.properties 
file caused a ClassNotFound exception.
